content: Analyze existing database schema and understand current employee-branch relationships
Design simplified database schema - only add home_branch flag to employee_branches table
Create migration scripts for existing employee data to assign home branches
Implement backend API endpoints for master branch management
Create scheduled transfer functionality for employees
Update shift management to work with home branch assignments
Modify employee management UI to include home branch selection
Update payroll processing to consider home branch vs punch-in branch
Implement branch-wise vs HO-wise payroll configuration
Update all reports to filter by home branch as default
Add fingerprint capacity management (750 employees per branch limit)
